page.title: 15DAD'S LORRY FIRM
page.content: My Mum and Dad own a lorry company.My Mum sorts out the money and paperwork. My Dad drives a lorry.The business is small,we have three lorries; a Ford,a Fiat and a Cargo.We are getting two more,we also have three drivers,my Dad, John and Gordon.The buisness has been running one year.We borrowed Â£1000 from my Grandad.Since then my dad has had 50_68 deliveries per day, Gordon has our Cargo for overnight jobs .My dad uses the Fiat to deliver things in London from Horizon brochures to Palets.John uses the Ford to deliver in places like Sevenoaks and Uxbridge near London.My Dad earns more money because he has more deliveries and he gets half his driver's money.We have to pay for most of the diesel,but sometimes it is paid for us.The parcels come from Tuffnels and V.N.S.M.
